roleset.name: cover the eyes
roleset.note: BLINDFOLD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'blindfold' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 9.9. (from blindfold.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: adjectival/adverbial
example.text: When it comes to investing, trying to weigh risk and reward can seem like [*] throwing darts blindfolded: Investors don't know the actual returns that securities will deliver, or the ups and downs that will occur along the way.

example.name: normal verb
example.text: John blindfolded Mary with silk scarves and a burlap sack.
example.arg: with silk scarves and a burlap sack
